>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/guest/orders/{orderNo}/cashReceipt"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>




## 부가설명 및 특이사항
구매자가 무통장입금 주문에 대하여 현금영수증을 발급하는 API 입니다.

## 화면예시
[![](http://image.toast.com/aaaaahb/api-description/order/guest/[POST]%20guest_orders_cashReceipt%20%EB%B9%84%ED%9A%8C%EC%9B%90%20%ED%98%84%EA%B8%88%EC%98%81%EC%88%98%EC%A6%9D%20%EC%8B%A0%EC%B2%AD.png?autox150)](http://image.toast.com/aaaaahb/api-description/order/guest/[POST]%20guest_orders_cashReceipt%20%EB%B9%84%ED%9A%8C%EC%9B%90%20%ED%98%84%EA%B8%88%EC%98%81%EC%88%98%EC%A6%9D%20%EC%8B%A0%EC%B2%AD.png)


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orderNo","in":"path","description":"주문번호","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"2020042100000001"},{"name":"Version","in":"header","description":"API 버전","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1.0"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"},{"name":"platform","in":"header","description":"클라이언트 플랫폼 (PC, MOBILE_WEB, AOS, IOS)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"PC"},{"name":"language","in":"header","description":"언어 (기본 값: ko)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"ko"},{"name":"guestToken","in":"header","description":"guestToken","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"12121a3-123123-1213"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"cashReceiptKeyType":{"type":"string","description":"현금영수증 발급 키 타입 (nullable)","example":"MOBILE_NO","enum":["CARD_NO: 카드번호","MOBILE_NO: 휴대폰번호","BUSINESS_NO: 사업자 번호","VOLUNTARY_NO: 자진발급 번호 (국세청 지정 고정번호)"]},"cashReceiptKey":{"type":"string","description":"발급 용도에 따른 키(소득공제용: 휴대폰번호, 지출증빙용: 사업자번호)","example":"123456"},"cashReceiptIssuePurposeType":{"type":"string","description":"발급용도","example":"INCOME_TAX_DEDUCTION","enum":["INCOME_TAX_DEDUCTION: 소득공제용","PROOF_EXPENDITURE: 지출증빙용","VOLUNTARY: 자진발급"]}},"description":"","title":"guest-orders-orderNo-cashReceipt1615532214"},"examples":{"post-guest-orders-order-no-cash-receipt":{"value":"{\"cashReceiptIssuePurposeType\":\"INCOME_TAX_DEDUCTION\",\"cashReceiptKeyType\":null,\"cashReceiptKey\":\"123456\"}"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
